divs: Sighting DetailsIm a Mexican living in Apodaca Nuevo leon Mexico, Im writing to you because I need your help very bad. If you get in contact with me I'll give you more specific information.I'm very sincere about this.I've been abducted several times by aliens and they have implanted in my head some sort of mechanism that they use to comunicate with me, they hear what i'm thinking I just think of something and they listen to my thoughts!!!! They also send me images to my brain the ones I see very clearly!!! They also see what I see like in a Camera Web!!! They treat me as an animal because If I dont obey they start hitting me with a laser!!! They hit me on my bones and it hurts!!! I need someones help!!! I need someone to remove the technology I have in my body!!!! They really burn me with a lazer!!Please get in contact with me!!! I'll give you a complete update on what they're doing right now to humanity!!! The information you have about them is nothing compared to what I have!!!! Please get in contact with me in person!!!! I'm a professional ,and I'm very sincere to you!!!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Nuevo Leon
